channel.title: Player Category / Pages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Player Category / Pages"

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: How do I add 'linked lists' to my character page?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Fair enough, the other looked a little neater, that's about it. I can deal with just a table lol.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: The missions template probably shouldn't be included in the charbox actually. Those values change too regularly, so I've reverted it back to before those were there.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
For the headband and the char image I actually uploaded it to my webpage and used it from there as a image link (didn't want to take up MORE space on here lol).

But I do have a question for you Uzuki; I got the mission template to show up (after making a table of my own, it just appeared today) but how to I edit it? (you can see my player char to see what I have 'done' lol)

I don't see the code for the missions template like I did for that character template, that's what is throwing me off, I don't know the method of coding necessary to edit it.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: i think i got it now…i just don't know how to get my head band to show..up

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: You do need to upload them. At the bottom of the page is a button that says "Files". Click that on your character page and upload the files there.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: okay good thank you…should i send you a picture or something or something like that…also do i need to upload the pictures to use them..???

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: I see the problem, it's just a matter of getting the images uploaded. When I get back home later tonight I'll see if I can't help you out a little bit more. I should be able to help with the headband at least, and may be able to help with the character portrait too.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Uzuki-san i tired it your way but i just missed up more…sigh is it possible to let sombody else do yours….if you ask them to….you can look at mine….sigh its a mess….http://bvs.wikidot.com/player:animist and maybe i can find sombody to help me

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
Are you having trouble just getting one started? Or is it the syntax that's throwing you off? You could try opening one of the more developed player pages (like Alyson or Captain) and clicking on "view source" at the bottom of the page (it's under the options section). It'll let you see how they did theirs.

Or you can open up mine and do the same. It's at Uzuki.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: good god how do you do the character pages its killing me i don't get it at all or maybe i am stupid but could some one help me here please

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
I just looked it up.

an'nai - information, leading, guidance

That name fits really well!

And as the founder of the village, you'd also be known as the Shodai Annaikage (First or Founding Information Shadow).

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: I think it roughly means Information or Knowledge or something akin to that. I was going for something consistent with the sub-text of the Village. And it didn't sound too strange like "Pestokage".

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Uzuki, I noticed in your profile that you call yourself the Annaikage of Wiki. I know that kage means shadow, and in the Narutoverse a kage is a leader of a hidden village, but what does Annai mean?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Definitely works for me. I believe we're 2 crystals and 1 person from being able to enter the war and get the Jonin council, assuming my understanding of how this all works is correct.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Just updated my profile to acount for changing villages. What do you think?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Thanks. Yeah I did. It took me two tries, requiring Kido: Iron Maiden, K-dog's Headband, the Reapers Bonus! team and a lot of lucky rolls.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
The part about pimping out Bugman's car was great ;)

Did you actually beat Tats without having Shikai? If you did, that's pretty crazy.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Those player pages are really cool, and a lot of fun to read. I think that both of your characters are incredibly creative. I made a profile for my character just a bit ago. I only intended to to write a few paragraphs, but somehow it turned into several pages! What do you think of it?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Same. I've been having fun reading them. I wasn't actually going to add mine until I read yours :P I've had Alyson (as well as Kayin, Naile, and a few others) as my main RP characters for…god…15 years now or so. They have incarnations in basicaly every type of RP or world I mess around in, so posting up info for them takes me a long time. What I stuck up there is still only a tiny piece compared to it all :3 And even then it's honestly modified from my original. I would have actually used Kayin instead of Alyson as a character (Alyson is normally strictly non-combat) but I accidentaly made Kayin into a RedEye when I wanted WhiteEye >_< so it's time to alter my normal reality ^-^; It's sorta scary actually, just how much I had to modify in order to make Alyson into a ninja o.O I had to re-write so much.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Slight change of topic, but I've been really happy with the player pages I've seen so far. I wasn't too sure people would take to them, but I've seen a lot of creativity come out of the pages so far. I'm really glad we added that section!

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: I won't argue that. On the other hand I picture him attacking a village much less than either Orochimaru or Itachi :P Not that we haven't seen Mr. Snake do it…how many times now? I sorta lost track of how many villages he's attacked.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Nah, probably not by that much. They just needed an ominous guy from the Hyugaa clan that was generally a jerk. He fit the bill closest :) He's no Itachi or Orochimaru, but he's still a jerk.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: o.o; Wow they really changed his character. I can't wait to get there :P

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: He is in Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN! If the plot plays out for all three bloodlines in the Jonin exam, he was the guy attacking the Village.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Meh, leave it to me to forget to log in. And oh right >.> I remember Whitey now. He's not much of a villain to blow up villages o.o; is he?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
I'm actually not familiar with Ol'Whitey at all. I don't remember them in the anime and I don't read the Manga so…dunno :P

And yea, Snakeman is definately the easiest. I may just make up some random villain but it always seems to make more sense to use some kind of tie-in with the series/game to add some small measure of linkage, if you know what I mean. Fits you into the world better to at least have interracted once on SOME kind of level with somebody/something in it.

Not sure Z-Dog and Trapchan have enough strength to wipe out a village, they don't seem to be the type to work with anybody else unless forced. :P Why do I read into this stuff so much.

Also, sad to say, I'm not familiar with anybody in bleach/death note. I just don't have the time to watch all the anime I would like right now (and thats a whooooooole lot XD).

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
Well, there's two places where SNAKEMAN currently shows up in Uzuki's history. Once as the guy in charge of Illarion when Uzu loses his left eye. The other is during the Jonin exam, and pretty much all Legacy fight Snakes during the Jonin exam.

There are other potential villains I suppose. WhiteEyes go up against Ol' Whitey during their Jonin exam. I've heard (though I can't confirm) that RedEye go up against Touchy, which is supposed to be Itachi. If you want to take a more Reaper bent, you could use Mister Six. If you're more in the assassin game, I'd guess you could use Anonymous too. Z-Dog and Trapchan are also options.

SNAKEMAN's just the easiest ;)

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
Ah, that works out then :P I tend to hate using anything that falls into "the norm" like Snakeman being the popular villain for screwing over everybody but he really is the only main villain who gets into stuff like destroying villages o.o;

Hehe, I just read your history also. Yay for Snakeman being the destroyer of all XD

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
The way the SNAKEMAN mission (Wake the Snake) works out, you pretty much capture SNAKEMAN as opposed to him allying with you. If you were simply to capture him, then you could keep your history pretty much the same. He wouldn't really be an ally.

Uzuki's going to have a similar issue, and I have SNAKEMAN already ;)

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Getting Snakeman as an ally (eventually) is going to be very…interesting considering my chars history. Then again Snakeman is the most popular villain so…meh. I really should be more original than using Snakey but he's so easy to use :3 Wonder if I should just make up a new villain for my history…

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
Haha, I know how that goes :)

I was thinking about extending mine some more still. I know I wanted to add something about getting my Ninja dog and my Ninja Puppet. And, I think I may add an additional bit about obtaining SNAKEMAN as an ally.

Though, I think I may hold off on that stuff until I've got my Village setup.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Oh, figures. At least it's working :P I still don't believe how long my character page got after I got it working o.o;

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: There's about a day lag on signatures. BvS updates overnight with changes, so if you just passed your Chunin exam today, it should show up tomorrow. That's kind of out of our control :)

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Yea, I finally finished mine. The only thing I can't seem to make work is my sig. For some reason it refuses to update and say I'm a Chunin now and not a Genin >_<

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: The character pages are a little daunting, but really cool.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Yay, I learned something else new today ^_^

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
If you click on someone's name, it'll bring up their profile. From there, you can see all their contributions to the site. That was the only player name I could find in the list of your contributions :)

(You can check mine too, it'll just be…kinda long :) )

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Yup, how did you guess :3

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
Is this the one?

http://bvswiki.com/player:alyson

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Dunno really. I sat down for half hour and taught myself how to do it so I have a page up now. What I don't know how to do is actually get the page to show up…I can't find it >_<

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
I don't think that's possible right now…the edit frame doesn't really have colors available in it. I could bracket everything in giant "XXX"'s or something to draw attention to the spots where people should be editing. I'm not sure how much that would help though.

Any thoughts?

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: I am one of those said people who can't translate heads or tails of those things. I would love to stick my character up on there but…I'm a wiki newb :P I've never even attempted something like this before and I can't figure out squat. I'm not sure where to put anything o.o; What we really need is some brave soul to go through each template and turn the spots we insert our info blue or something ^^;

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: Thanks! I'm hoping more people kind of get into it. But it seems like a lot of people are getting frightened by the template. I wonder if there's a way to simplify the template in some way as to keep people from getting overwhelmed. I'm not sure there is at this point.

item.title: Re: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded: It was a really great idea. I have never really thought of giving my character a "life". It was fun and it wasn't to difficult, you only take basis in the missions, the basic of BvS, a touch of the Animes, mix it all togherter, and you have created life…IT'S ALIVE. And when your "done" (it is someones life it is never done before the BvS character is deleted), you can read what life other has created.

item.title: Player Category / Pages
item.content:encoded:
I was thinking it might be a good idea to let people setup Wiki pages for their characters. It'd be a place where they could document their jutsu and accomplishments, and fill in some backstory to their character if they wanted. I can set this category up such that only the original page creator (and any administrators, which is just me) would be able to edit the page. This should stop people from defacing other people's pages.

My only real concern with this is that people may upload copyrighted images that we won't have the rights to redistribute. I think we'll just have to add a disclaimer in the template or something to make it easy for copyright owners to contact me to remove images when necessary. It probably won't be a problem. Probably.

Thoughts? Would you guys like to do this? Or do you think it'd make the Wiki too cluttered?
